modShortDescription: Ammo can't break blocks anymore. This 7 Days to Die mod removes the block damage capabilities of all ammo types, grenade type and mine types.
modDescription:
Ammo can’t break blocks anymore. This 7 Days to Die mod removes the block damage capabilities of all [ammo](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-ammo/) types, grenade type and mine types so they only kill zombies, people and animals.

Glass and cloth still are damageable tho. (will work on it to remove them as well if possible)

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/stallionsden/stallionsmodlets/tree/main/stallionsdens%20Anti%20Block%20Bullets)**

If you appreciate Stallionsden’s work and you want to show support, use this [donate link](http://paypal.me/AnthonyCar78).

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/19911-stallionsdens-and-valmars-a19-mod-thread/).

**Credits:** [Stallionsden](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/stallionsden/)
